title: Santa Cruz Integrative Medicine | Holistic Doctors in Santa Cruz | Santa Cruz Integrative Medicine, 740 Front Street #130, Santa Cruz, CA, USA
description: Santa Cruz Integrative Medicine is an award-winning medical clinic based out of Santa Cruz, California. Our integrative medicine services include acupuncture, naturopathic medicine, prolotherapy & PRP, ketamine assisted psychotherapy.
cleaned_text: top of page Awarded Best Clinic and Doctors in Santa Cruz Every Year from 2009-2023! Santa Cruz Integrative Medicine offers a medical and wellness home for you and your family. We combine evidence-based holistic approaches, traditional healing modalities, and cutting-edge western medical care all under one roof. Whether you are hoping to get back to feeling like yourself again, or looking forward to achieving and maintaining optimal health, we've got you covered. You can learn more about our practitioners or schedule an appointment below. Meet the Team bottom of page
